content:
This chunk is part of an initialization or setup method within a distributed object class. The code ensures that only one auto-interest is allowed per Distributed Class (DC) definition by checking the length of `autoInterests`. If multiple are found, it raises an error for consistency and correctness.

# should be removed
        if len(autoInterests) > 1:
            self.notify.error(
                'only one auto-interest allowed per DC class, %s has %s autoInterests (%s)' %
                (self.dclass.getName(), len(autoInterests), list(autoInterests)))
        _getAutoInterests = None
        return list(autoInterests)
